name: @baruchiro/paperless-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for interacting with Paperless-NGX document management system. Enables AI assistants to manage documents, tags, correspondents, and document types through the Paperless-NGX API.

tools.name: list_documents
tools.description: Get a paginated list of all documents.

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Get a specific document by ID.

tools.name: download_document
tools.description: Download a document file by ID.

tools.name: get_document_thumbnail
tools.description: Get a document thumbnail (image preview) by ID.

tools.name: bulk_edit_documents
tools.description: Perform bulk operations on multiple documents.

tools.name: post_document
tools.description: Upload a new document to Paperless-NGX.

url.title: Paperless URL
url.description: The full URL to your Paperless-NGX instance (including https://)
